mapper.insert:
insert into jy_resouces ( id, teacher_id, school_id, file_id, url, name, type, create_time, file_size, update_time ) values ( #{id} , #{teacherId} , #{schoolId} , #{fileId} , #{url} , #{name} , #{type} , now(), #{fileSize}, now()
)
mapper.update:
update jy_resouces
teacher_id=#{teacherId},
school_id=#{schoolId},
file_id=#{fileId},
url=#{url},
name=#{name},
type=#{type},
browse_number=#{browseNumber},
download_number=#{downloadNumber},
commend_number=#{commendNumber},
create_time=#{createTime},
file_size=#{fileSize},
update_time=now(),
share_status=#{shareStatus}
where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO jy_resouces ( id, teacher_id, school_id, file_id, url, name, type, create_time, file_size, update_time, share_status ) VALUES
( #{jyResouces.id}, #{jyResouces.teacherId}, #{jyResouces.schoolId}, #{jyResouces.fileId}, #{jyResouces.url}, #{jyResouces.name}, #{jyResouces.type}, now(), #{jyResouces.fileSize}, now(), '0' )

delete from jy_resouces where id in
#{item}

#{item}

#{item}
